snippet.title: Touhou Kourinden ~ Mythos of Phantasmagoria | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
If you’ve played any of the Chuhou Joutai games, you’re probably familiar with Kozan - the country the trilogy is set in. It’s time to go back over 300 years before Susumu Takajima and Kagami Ochiai. You can uncover the legend of Kozan in this all new role-playing epic. You play the roles of Rinnosuke “Kourin” Morichika and Marisa Kirisame - the ancestors of Crown Princess Konata.

The King of Sweden has given you a prophecy. The Scarlet Devil is laying evil waste on the land. In order to defeat him, you will have to gather four legendary objects. As you battle your way throughout the land, you will gain experience and strength. If you succeed in defeating the Scarlet Devil, a new kingdom in the Land of Illusions will emerge.

Wishlist the game or try the demo on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2819830

Get Chuhou Joutai 3 on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2010200/

Get Paraided! on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1634290/

Get the first Chuhou Joutai on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1220520

Visit our website: https://drillimation.com/
